
                            
                            <p>以前没什么选择，米诺就蔓迪上百块钱一瓶，保法止几块钱一粒，效果应该有区别，但是日积月累用原研药也伤不起，植发价格也慢慢打下来了，以后能彻底攻克脱发就好了，天天用药也是很麻烦一件事 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/18/195011rnnz3qtqqtbehq9t.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/18/195011rnnz3qtqqtbehq9t.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/18/195049kbcw9czcql95bb95.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/18/195049kbcw9czcql95bb95.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p>
